column1: Quotes
do not cry because it is over smile because it happened
for every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness
you will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of  you will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life
happiness is the art of never holding in your mind the memory of any unpleasant thing that has passed
to be happy we must not be too concerned with others
the moments of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise It is not that we seize them but that they seize us
it is not what you have or who you are or where you are or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy It is what you think about
there is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will
we tend to forget that happiness does not come as a result of getting something we dont have but rather of recognizing and appreciating what we do have
sometimes your joy is the source of your smile but sometimes your smile can be the source of your joy
happy people plan actions they do not plan results
happiness is when what you think what you say and what you do are in harmony
the only joy in the world is to begin
some cause happiness wherever they go others whenever they go
success is not the key to happiness happiness is the key to success
there is only one cause of unhappiness the false beliefs you have in your head beliefs so widespread so commonly held that it never occurs to you to question them
happiness is not something readymade it comes from your own actions
happiness depends upon ourselves
happiness is having a large loving caring closeknit family in another city
happiness is not in the mere possession of money it lies in the joy of achievement in the thrill of creative effort
happiness is acceptance
the secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes but in liking what one does
most people would rather be certain they are miserable than risk being happy
of all forms of caution caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness
happiness is a state of activity
since you get more joy out of giving joy to others you should put a good deal of thought into the happiness that you are able to give
very little is needed to make a happy life it is all within yourself in your way of thinking
i would far rather be happy than right any day
the art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things
being happy is something that each of us determines it is not something that we find outside of yourself it is within us and our choice
the happiest people seem to be those who have no particular cause for being happy except that they are so
happiness is a deep sense of flourishing not a mere pleasurable feeling or fleeting emotion but an optimal state of being
most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be
we do not laugh because we are happy  we are happy because we laugh
think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy
happiness is entirely up to you and always has been
be happy for no reason like a child if you are happy for a reason you are in trouble because that reason can be taken from you
the secret of being happy is accepting where you are in life and making the most out of every day
nothing can bring you happiness but yourself
the only thing that will make you happy is being happy with who you are and not who people think you are
i enjoyed my life when i had nothing and kinda like the idea of just being happy with me
being happy in your skin that is what it is all about
be happy with being you love your flaws own your quirks and know that you are just as perfect as anyone else exactly as you are
those who can laugh without cause have either found the true meaning of happiness or have gone stark raving mad
true happiness arises in the first place from the enjoyment of ones self
if you want others to be happy practice compassion If you want to be happy practice compassion
very little is needed to make a happy life it is all within yourself in your way of thinking
i would do my damn best to be more happy than not
happiness doesnot have to be chase it merely has to be chosen
the talent for being happy is appreciating and liking what you have instead of what you do not have
be happy with what you have be excited about what you want
if being happy is important to you try this instead of regretting all you lack celebrate all you have got
i just find myself happy with the simple things appreciating the blessings god gave me
happiness is not having what you want It is appreciating what you have
ever since happiness heard your name it has been running through the streets trying to find you
just think how happy you would be if you lost everything you have right now and then got it back again
happiness is not having what you want but wanting what you have
do not forget to hope and happy be
it is not my job to make you happy It is your job to learn that only those who quit selfishly seeking their own happiness find it
the art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things
happiness is when what you think what you say and what you do are in harmony
happiness is not something readymade It comes from your own actions
many persons have a wrong idea of what constitutes true happiness It is not attained through self gratification but through fidelity to a worthy purpose
happiness is not a station you arrive at but a manner of traveling
i do not care about having money It is about being happy man
we all live with the objective of being happy our lives are all different and yet the same
happiness, not in another place but this place not for another hour but this hour
the grand essentials of happiness are something to do something to love and something to hope for
you can never be really happy if you keep holding to those bad memories which makes you sad
doing what you like is freedom liking what you do is happiness
happiness is where we find it but very rarely where we seek it
if you want to be happy you need to set your mind on happiness
happiness is the art of learning how to get joy from your substance
stay positive and happy work hard and donot give up hope be open to criticism and keep learning surround yourself with happy warm and genuine people
folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be
be happy with what you have be excited about what you want
you will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of you will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life
only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile
i have only two kinds of days happy and hysterically happy
happiness is the key to success
success is not the key to happiness happiness is the key to success if you love what you are doing you will be successful
people should find happiness in the little things like family
as people spin faster and faster in the pursuit of merely personal happiness they become exhausted in the futile effort of chasing themselves
whoever is happy will make others happy
happy girls are the prettiest
learn to value yourself which means fight for your happiness
family friends a good laugh and beautiful weather are the best cures
happiness consists more in conveniences of pleasure that occur everyday than in great pieces of good fortune that happen but seldom
a great obstacle to happiness is to expect too much happiness
to be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness
the secret of happiness is freedom the secret of freedom is courage
happiness is a way station between too little and too much
it is not how much we have but how much we enjoy that makes happiness
there is no happiness like that of being loved by your fellow creatures and feeling that your presence is an addition to their comfort
be happy it is one way of being wise
nobody really cares if you are miserable so you might as well be happy
i think the key to life is just being a happy person and happiness will bring you success
happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness
happiness grows at our own firesides and is not to be picked in strangers gardens
happiness is always the serendipitous result of looking for something else
happiness is excitement that has found a settling down place but there is always a little corner that keeps flapping around
if only we would stop trying to be happy we could have a pretty good time
happiness is not a goal it is a by product
the essence of philosophy is that a man should so live that his happiness shall depend as little as possible on external things
the search for happiness is one of the chief sources of unhappiness
my family did not have a lot of money and I am grateful for that money is the longest route to happiness
happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort
we tend to forget that happiness does not come as a result of getting something we donot have but rather of recognizing and appreciating what we do have
there can be no happiness if the things we believe in are different from the things we do
no medicine cures what happiness cannot
give a man health and a course to steer and he will never stop to trouble about whether he is happy or not
happiness is having a large loving caring close knit family in another city
there is only one happiness in this life to love and be loved
how simple it is to see that we can only be happy now and there will never be a time when it is not now
happiness is a by product of an effort to make someone else happy
